Advanced Commands. heal - Used to heal a target. Can use by radius. res - Used to res a target. Can use by radius. kill - Used to kill a targetted Mob. Can use by radius. block - Used to block a target. Can use by radius. unblock - Used to unblock a target. Can use by radius. remove_cooldown - Used to clear skill cooldown of a target. Can use by radius. cancel - Removes the targetted players buff. Can use by radius. push - Push the targetted player by 300 range . debug - Show target resists and powers. debug_stats - Show target all stats. reset_skills - Restores your skills from before the get_skills command. reset_reuse - Reset enter to instance zone Id. reset_reuse_all - Reset enter to all instance zones. give_item - Used to add items to target(give_item id count). mail - Not a command. Just send typical mail with reciever name ONLINE_ALL, optional with items. spawn - Spawns a Mob on current target. Usage - //spawn npc_id delete - Used to remove a targetted Mob. Mob will not respawn. Simple Commands, Page 1 Punishment Commands, Page 3
